body_html: @gunan btw, one idea of making some of these flaky numeric tests less flaky is to always run nodes in the same order. We improved determinism of our stuff by adding control deps that force computation to use deterministic execution order (https://github.com/yaroslavvb/stuff/tree/master/linearize)

body: @gunan btw, one idea of making some of these flaky numeric tests less flaky is to always run nodes in the same order. We improved determinism of our stuff by adding control deps that force computation to use deterministic execution order (https://github.com/yaroslavvb/stuff/tree/master/linearize)
